title: Land near Royal College
details:
*This is a valuable land near Royal upper school (01 km away from the main gate)
*Inside the Urban Council of the Polonnaruwa (Maha Nagara Sabhawa - Polonnaruwa)
*Boundary Wall constructed around the land (7ft Height)
*10 ft Acess Road
*Calm Environment
*NWSDB water connection already get
*Single phase electricity supply
*Flat land with three coconut tree
*Urgent Sale
